en: No matter how hard I try, I can't remember how to do it.
zh: 无论我怎么努力，我都记不得该怎么做了。

en: Why don't you get rid of your motorcycle? You never ride it anymore.
zh: 你为什么不把你的摩托车处理掉呢？你再也不骑它了。

en: How did you learn how to play the violin?
zh: 你是怎么学会拉小提琴的？

en: Why did you make such a mistake?
zh: 你为什么会犯这样的错误？

en: Why do you want such an old car?
zh: 你为什么想要这么旧的车？

en: How did you come to hear that?
zh: 你是怎么听到这件事的？

en: Why did you come over here?
zh: 你为什么来这里？

en: Why won't you listen to reason?
zh: 你为什么不听劝呢？

en: Why did he live in the United States?
zh: 他为什么住在美国？

en: Why didn't you read the magazine?
zh: 你为什么没看杂志？

en: How did you end up on your own?
zh: 你怎么会独自一人了？

en: Why didn't you come to the party?
zh: 你为什么没来参加聚会？

en: Please keep this secret.
zh: 请保守这个秘密。

en: Please don't forget to mail this letter.
zh: 请别忘了寄这封信。

en: Would you please have a look at these papers?
zh: 请你看看这些文件好吗？

en: Please wake me up at seven.
zh: 请你在七点叫醒我。

en: He didn't know what to say, so he remained silent.
zh: 他不知道该说什么，所以保持沉默。

en: Since he didn't know what to say, he remained silent.
zh: 因为他不知道该说什么，所以保持沉默。

en: Why did you cry?
zh: 你为什么哭？

en: What does that mean?
zh: 那是什么意思？

en: I can't possibly help you.
zh: 我根本帮不了你。
